mapper.select: SELECT b.boardIdx, b.writerIdx, u.nickname, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.createdAt FROM Board b JOIN User u ON b.writerIdx = u.userIdx WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (writer_idx, title, content) VALUES (#{writerIdx}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updated_at=default WHERE board_idx=#{boardIdx}
